welcome_message_body: Welcome to Butha-Buthe, Lesotho! Known for its breathtaking mountain scenery and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore our charming city and immerse yourself in its unique culture. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Butha-Buthe.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Leribe Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Leribe Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi access throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Seshutes Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Seshutes Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
